statement.p: In the model \displaystyle{A}={151.7}{e}^{{{0.0248}{t}}} what is the percent increase or decrease?
Note all numbers are scientific measurements.

solution.p: The percent increase/decrease is calculated from \displaystyle{e}^{{0.0248}}\approx{1.0251100780053}. Because this is bigger than 1, this is a percent increase and the result is \displaystyle{1.0251100780053}-{1}={0.025110078005259}\approx{0.0251} and the percent is 2.51.
We round to 3 significant digits because the measurement (exponent) had 3 significant digits.
